name: Bienvenue WiFi
pitch: Bienvenue WiFi is an operator dedicated to short-term Internet needs. We provide mobile WiFi for travellers, and temporary networks for events organisators.

name: Blueboard
pitch: Make better eCommerce decisions for your brand. BlueBoard is a B2B tracking tool that allows real-time monitoring of your products at your online retailers.

name: Buffactory
pitch: Buffactory is a musical collaboration platform dedicated to Ableton Live users, it allows musicians to collaborate simultaneously on the same project with as many collaborators as they want. Buffactory is the Github for musicians.

name: Deploy Station
pitch: DeployStation is a multi-platform application for game server creation and its easy management

name: Energy Square
pitch: EnergySquare reinvents mobile charging with a new patented wireless technology that allows users to charge several devices on a large and thin surface.

name: Hopfab
pitch: Hopfab is the first marketplace to discover and purchase in one click artisan-made-to-measure furnitures. Hopfab gathers the community of artisans in order to offer a simple and unique access point to the most complete and flexible furniture offering.

name: Koober
pitch: Koober selects and compresses the best non fiction books. Koober is a web and mobile app that offers hundreds of curated non fiction book summaries to read in less than 30 minutes. In other words with Koober you can read books without actually reading them...

name: Meloflow
pitch: Meloflow is an iOS app designed to help learning and practicing a musical instrument. Pick a song, start playing, Meloflow will give you instants feedback, plays along with you, tracks your speed automatically in real time and much more!

name: MonTransport.com
pitch: monTransport.com is the marketplace for taxis, minicabs, coaches, limos and moto-taxis services in France.Find, compare and book a suited transport service at the best rate. Our 2 900+ affiliated transport providers will compete to transport you!

name: Travauxlib
pitch: Travauxlib is the best way to estimate the cost of your home renovation and then book carefully filtered and rated local builders online.

name: Truckfly
pitch: Truckfly helps companies find the right carrier for their loads by connecting them to truckers driving empty in their area.

name: Willty
pitch: Willty is a customer engagement platform for fitness clubs who lose their clients too quickly. It provides automated tools to engage with members and turn them into ideal customers which generate more revenue for the gym. Willty is already working with 40+ clubs and engaging with their 40000+ members daily.

name: Workiz
pitch: Workiz enables companies to enhance their sales force and accelerate their growth thanks to students paid on success-fees.

name: Budeal
pitch: A simple and friendly garage sale on your smartphone! Budeal is a mobile app that allows you to buy and sell  products quickly and easily. Budeal reinvents classified ads using smartphones and social networks to simplify the sale of products and to bring more trusts in transactions.

name: Corilla
pitch: Corilla is a cloud-based technical writing tool that refocuses the authoring experience on collaborative workflows and content reuse. We remove the complexity of authoring and maintaining modular content that your entire team can curate and deploy on-demand. Corilla reduces your customer support costs while making technical writers happy using tools they love to create content that your users actually read.

name: Coursierprivé
pitch: Coursier Privé is a B2B urban delivery service, 50% cheaper than traditional couriers, completely transparent, empowering outstanding delivery experience. Our technology enhances impulsion buying by delivering all parcels the quickest way possible, at the best price, maximising merchant's ROI, minimising end-user's click-to-possession, and reducing gas emissions of drivers.

name: Filoute
pitch: Filoute provides craft tutorials to help you succeed: you can learn when, where and how you like. Enjoy classes anytime from the convenience of your home, watch them at your preferred pace, revisit your favorite concept with just a click, ask your expert instructors questions, and learn easily with videos that walk you step-by-step through gaining skills.

name: FoodMeUp
pitch: FoodMeUp is the first SaaS dedicated to recipe management. It allows professionals of the food industry to organize their recipes (collaborative work, versioning, tree structure), manage their production (merge recipes, retrieve all ingredients, manage stocks and send orders, print multiple technical sheets) and access analytics (costs,profitability, etc.)

name: Fretx
pitch: FRETX is a smart device that attaches to your guitar fretboard and transforms music notation into light patterns directly on your fretboard, making the learning experience easier and more dynamic.

name: Gorgias
pitch: Doing customer support is repetitive. Customer Support people spend half of their day responding to only 10 different questions, which are asked over and over. In small businesses, they usually copy paste responses.Today, progress in machine learning makes a change possible. With Gorgias, they can be automatically suggested what to respond to those questions, and save 30 minutes per day.

name: Kapptivate
pitch: Mobile money is a revolution! In 2014, 42% of Kenya's GPD is spent through a mobile money service. Systems are now critical and operators need to invest in the quality and the liability of their solutions. At Kapptivate we created an amazing solution to ensure the quality and liability of a mobile money service by automating testing, monitoring and analysis phases. With Kapptivate you have all you need to drive safely your revolution.

name: Kwalito
pitch: Kwalito checks the composition of food products simply by scanning their barcode. Kwalito does not evaluate products as good or bad, because eating healthy does not mean the same thing for everybody. It simply matches your food requirements with the ingredients written on labels in order to give you a simple answer: this products fits you or not.

name: La Boite qui Cartonne
pitch: La Boite Qui Cartonne is a service which takes care of the belongings cluttering your flat in a simple manner: for 6€ per month, La BQC will go to your home along with large boxes (60x40x40xm) and will take them back, once you've finished placing your things, to it's secured storage facilities and keep them for the timespan of your choice. Clothes, tools, books,... you can then ask to get your things back anytime and anywhere you wish with ease.

name: Les Petites Tables
pitch: What if you were told that it's possible to eat delicious, local, proper, non-junk food in restaurants without ruining your wallet? What if you could afford to do this on a daily basis? What if you didn't have to read thousand reviews and spend hours to find a new place? Les Petites Tables is about making such experiences possible. Made by a team of two different foodies: a very tall food critique and an always-smiling entrepreneur.

name: Le Zeste
pitch: Le Zeste is a superfast food delivery service for gourmet and demanding urban people. Every day, chef Mehdi Favri and his team feature healthy, creative and delicious meals on our website. You can order in 3 clicks and get delivered in less than 20 minutes. Today, Le Zeste is used and loved by professionals who work late in their office. It aims to become the biggest online restaurant in Europe, serving every demanding person for lunch or diner.

name: Pandascore
pitch: PandaScore aims to become the date provider for e-sports. That means working with the 4 pillars of the (e)sports economy: brands, teams, media and bookmakers. We are delivering a SaaS platform to access the data in a sexy way: clean UX, data visualization, swagger API...

name: PopUp Immo
pitch: PopUp Immo is the #1 marketplace dedicated exclusively to the rental of short-term commercial real estate. PopUp Immo revolutionizes short-term commercial space rental by allowing businesspeople, brands, designers and e-commerce companies to rent pop-up stores, showrooms or other spaces for as little as one day or one week, to upwards of several months, in complete simplicity and without a long-term commitment.

name: Read
pitch: We change the way people read, retain and work on written content on mobile. Today, readers enjoy our app to read their own ePub files. We then will make it easy to access and open every file that needs to be read on mobile. And from there, Read offers the best experience.

name: Show-Roomer
pitch: Show-Roomer is a solution that enables web merchant to touch 2/3 of visitors on their website who whould never have bought without touching or trying the product. Show-Roomer aims to reassure the visitor who is interested by a product, by connecting him with a current customer who has already bought the product. The current customer is going to share his/her experience of the product, in exchange of a commission on the sale made after a demonstration of the product at his house (or phone call).

name: Skippair
pitch: With Skippair, we make sea travel easy for all! We have created the first platform linking travellers who are dreaming to discover sailing with professional skipper who needs help to sell their packages. On Skippair.com, within a few clicks you get to choose your skipper and embark wherever you want. We prove that we have the best offer to democratize sea travels, 1/3 of our customers are complete beginners.

name: Stride
pitch: Stride helps organizations to learn from their data, so that they can put intelligence in everything they do and enable them to get right information to the right people at the right time. Businesses have accumulated huge amount of text across various channels such as social media, surveys, customer feedback and literature. Stride helps organizations to extract knowledge from it, by identifying the five "W", and the associated sentiment, from it.

name: Supermood
pitch: Supermood makes your company culture awesome! By asking three questions a week, we engage your employees and tell you what really happens in your company. By combining HR research and machine learning, we ask the right questions at the right time, and give you actionable advice to make everyone engaged.

name: Vocal Apps
pitch: Ironman, Knight Rider or Star Trek, talking with an artificial intelligence that is here to assist us will be such a huge progress in our lives. Sadly, we are not there yet. Today's tools to build smart voice interfaces are all based on an obscure and very limited XML syntax. Our solution allows developers to create vocal applications 10 times faster with an incomparable linguistic flexibility. We already have renowned customers from smart home, automotive and robotics industry.

name: Welcome to the Jungle
pitch: Recruiting is broken and we want to fix it! The solution is not multiplying job posting solutions, but working on the employer brand: how to attract the right talents and make them apply?Welcome to the Jungle is the online platform that showcases the culture and the specificities of carefully selected companies, so that candidates can discover who they want to work for. By creating high quality content (photos, videos, editorial) we make the job search enjoyable again.

name: Archive Valley
pitch: A startup premiering terrific archives!

name: Birdly
pitch: Birdly is the first Slack bot that makes the expense reporting experience completely seamless. We extract information from receipts and use data intelligence to determine the relevant client, project, or travel context of the expense.

name: Deepomatic
pitch: Deepomatic develops a deep learning based technology allowing medias to monetize their images by linking them to purchasable products.

name: Drust
pitch: Become a SuperDriver, confident, open and connected. Drust is a new dongle on the OBD socket of the car and bluetooth-connected to a smartphone via a community app. It brings users individualized advice and solution to drive smarter and save money on gas and repair.

name: Jam
pitch: Jam facilitates the daily life of thousands of students while answering to each of their requests.

name: Nunki
pitch: Nunki is the first social newsviewer. Nunki is a free iPhone App that reinvents the way of keeping up to date with breaking news and live entertainment bringing its user into the heart of the action

name: Pulpix
pitch: Pulpix is a video technology that displays interactive bonus content in real-time within your video, enhancing the experience for your audience and boosting your revenue

name: SharePay
pitch: SharePay is an app that turns payment into a collaborative and sharing moment. It allows you to invite your friends, parents, co-workers, roomies or sweetheart to share in your payment to complete a purchase, all together, in real-time and without advancing money.

name: Sharette
pitch: Active member of the collaborzative economy, Sharette is a market place dedicated to mobility in urban areas, combining short-distance carpooling with the existing network of public transports.

name: Soundsgood
pitch: Create and discover playlists across all streaming platforms. Soundsgood.co is uniting the world's first community of music curators.

name: Tiller Systems
pitch: TILL By Tiller Systems is a turnkey mobile point-of-sale solution designed for bars and restaurants. It combines an intuitive iPad-based oredering platform with an innovative web-based back-office in which restaurant professionals can access management tools and analytics in real time.

name: UniqueSound
pitch: UniqueSound is a marketplace that allows brands, agencies and producers to directly request music from composers. Buyers post briefs outlining their music requirements and talented composers respond by submitting their music. It's that simple!

name: Back Market
pitch: Back Market is the (super) market of reconditioned products.

name: Eatrip
pitch: Mobile application: A culinary guide for every country you're visiting.

name: FrenchMedicine.com
pitch: FrenchMedicine is a vidioconference service which allows you to see a doctor, no matter where you are. It aims to improve care access for expatriates and French speaking populations.

name: La Box Culturelle
pitch: The best of Parisian culture directly in your mailbox.

name: La Chouette à Lunettes
pitch: A book + an application to read stories in a brand new way.

name: Listen Ensemble
pitch: Listen Ensemble is a chamber music orchestra that shapes its projects around digital culture and new technologies.

name: Needelp
pitch: The mutual assistance between neighbours! Home improvement, cleaning, delivery...

name: Noosfeer
pitch: Use Noosfeer to enhance your reading experience and stop accumulating stuff you'll never read.

name: Ouishare
pitch: OuiShare is a global community that connects people, organisations and ideas around fairness, openness and trust

name: Pythagora
pitch: The platform for educative videos.

name: Skappy
pitch: Skappy is an online anti-stress personal assistant.

name: Social Media Club France
pitch: The Social Media Club is an association for new media experts who meetup on a weekly basis to explore and showcase the latest industry trends.

name: Agriconomie
pitch: Agriconomie is a B2B market place specialised in the agricultural sector. It creates a more efficient bridge between farmers and their products and inputs suppliers.

name: Artips
pitch: Artips sends a daily anecdote, witty and memorable, about an art masterpiece, to be read in 1 minute only. Artips makes art and its history more accessible both in terms of content and mobility.

name: BandSquare
pitch: BandSquare enable emerging artists to perform on stage thanks to a ticketing system based on crowdfunding principles: if enough people book their tickets, the concert is confirmed. We bring the venues, we have the audience. The production risk of an emerging artist is mutualised.

name: Hublo
pitch: Hublo allows marketers to set-up tracking for web analytics on their site visually and without relying on their tech teams.

name: Krak
pitch: Krak is a hardware device + app for skaters to allow them to track their sessions, share their tricks, discover news spots in their city

name: LocalEyes
pitch: LocalEyes is a mobile app that allows anyone to earn money on-the-go by collecting information in stores for brands and retailers. Brands and retailers can now check-on any product or service in real-time accross thousands of stores.

name: Qleek.me
pitch: Qleek allows you to share with people your digital life by putting your most beloved songs, films and photographs in the real world.

name: Realytics
pitch: Realytics is a real-time TV ads tracking platform for online businesses.Realitycs enables advertisers to precisely analyze the impact and ROI of each TV ad spot and help them to understand their visitors' behavior.

name: StreamRoot
pitch: StreamRoot is a smart peer-to-peer video streaming solution that drastically  reduces bandwidth costs for web video platforms, and improves the quality of service for the end users.

name: Takes
pitch: Takes.io is a video making collaboration platform. It helps producers, directors and others work together on a single platform. It works with YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion. Instead of using email chains, you can share a private YouTube video with a client. You can directly comment and annotate videos on Takes.io

name: TasteHit
pitch: TasteHit is a SaaS product recommendation engine for online shops that lets visitors control their shopping experience. Using state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms TasteHit understands shoppers' tastes and behaves as the best virtual salesperson by increasing conversion and making shoppers more loyal.

name: Tripndrive
pitch: Tripndrive enables car sharing for travellers. The departing traveller gets the use of a free parking space by renting their car at low cost to another traveller.

name: Auticiel
pitch: Software tools to include cognitively impaired persons in society. With healthcare professionals and families, Auticiel develops adapted software to improve social insertion, school and emplyment accessibility for cognitively impaired persons.

name: Cours avenue
pitch: CoursAvenue.com is a free service that makes it easier to find, compare and enroll in all sorts of amazing classes at the best possible price. For the class providers, it facilitates their daily tasks and optimizes their booking rates.

name: Darjeelin
pitch: The crowdsourced travel agency helping you to save loads of time and tons of money.

name: Decovery
pitch: Decovery is a place where experts and home design enthusiasts get together to help you transform your interior. The team is now part of Côtémaisons.

name: Julie Desk
pitch: Julie is a virtual assistant using artificial intelligence to schedule your meetings and appointments

name: Lingocracy
pitch: Lingocracy turns any web article into a personalised language session

name: Melusyn
pitch: Bring stories to real life. From script to production, work together to build, schedule and manage a story on PC/Mac and mobile.

name: Pricing Assistant
pitch: Pricing optimization solution for e-merchants and brands

name: Smiirl
pitch: Smiirl creates and builds smart objects for businesses and help them to reconnect their social identities to their physical presence.

name: SOAP
pitch: Soap creates collaborative video souvenir of an event made from participants individuals videos.

name: Sportdub
pitch: Live sport commentaries by sport fans, for sport fans.

name: Zéro-gâchis
pitch: A mobile and web platform where consumers can locate the discount (-30 to 70%) applied on the sell-by date products in the partners supermarkets around them.

name: Augment
pitch: Augment allows anyone to view instantly a product or object in their home using augmented reality before buying to be sure that it suits them. This removes one of the main obstascles to purchasing online

name: Explee
pitch: Explee is an online software which allows anyone to create awesome animated videos.

name: Fleex
pitch: Learn English with your favorite movies and TV shows, choosing from a variety of sources including torrents, downloaded video files, and YouTube videos.

name: Home'n'go
pitch: Looking for a new place to live? Find all the real estate listings & information and team up with the relevant people with whom you'll share it on one single platform.

name: Jellynote
pitch: Jellynote is a social platform for musicians to help them play and learn music. You can read sheet music online, enrich them with videos and share to your friends.

name: Lima
pitch: Lima is a revolutionary and innovative technology that consolidates all of your content, enabling you to see the same files on all of your devices regardless of operating system or device size. Composed of a smart hardware adapter and a multi-platform app, Lima enables users to easily and seamlessly access their entire digital library from all of their devices, wherever they are.

name: Sketchfab
pitch: Sketchfab is a web service to publish, share and embed interactive 3D models on web pages, and display them in real-time without a plug-in.

name: Stormz
pitch: By combining methodology and digital technology, Stormz designs and facilitates huge collaborative events that engage your teams

name: Veezio
pitch: Veezio is a fully automatic video analysis, optimization and indexing platform.

name: Voice Polls ex Poutsch
pitch: Poutsch facilitates the way we collect, express and make sense of opinions. The team is now working on Voice Polls that allows businesses to easily have answers from their consumers before taking decisions.

name: Webshell
pitch: Webshell allows companies to create a community of developers around their data or services through a platform for developing web applications and mobile-oriented open innovation. The team is now working on OAuth.io described as the highway to API integration!

name: Whale Street
pitch: Whale Street develops a SaaS platform that helps finance professionals take better investment decisions by extracting relevant signals in real time from social media and the web.

name: HereWeDate
pitch: HereWeDate is a fun way to meet new people: play the game!

name: Infinit
pitch: The mobile and desktop app that lets you send files of unlimited size.

name: LoungeUp
pitch: LoungeUp is a solution that allows hoteliers to interact with their guests before, during, and after their stay, improving revenue, guest satisfaction and knowledge of their consumer habits.

name: Oleapark
pitch: Your social event badge. Offer the best mobile networking experience to your attendees.

name: Onefeat
pitch: Onefeat is a social game where people achieve missions and earn points according to what they do in real life.

name: Pictarine
pitch: Pictarine includes all the photos of your social networks in one app. A great experience to enjoy all your photos and those of your friends posted on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Flickr, Tumblr...

name: Pili Pop
pitch: Pili Pop creates stimulating and engaging apps for youngsters to help them find the fun in learning languages.

name: qunb
pitch: qunb helps anyone turn their most valuable data into compelling / visual / actionable stories.

name: Siz - by Viewrz
pitch: Your source of the Internet best content.

name: Skimm!
pitch: Skimm!, a disruptive, entirely software-based mobile payment system, enables its users to pay in participating stores, redeem promotional coupons and process user-to-user transactions.

name: TVShow Time
pitch: Following the news of TV series was an ordeal. TVShow Time makes this easy by providing a single place for all the news, information and fan arts related to the series that you follow.

name: WeCook
pitch: WeCook help you to plan your family week of meals and grocery list with highly personalized recommendation

name: Bankin'
pitch: Take care of your money: all your bank accounts, in real-time, in one single app.

name: Beansight
pitch: A social network dedicated to predictions. Users can prove their expertise in dedicated fields thanks to their accuracy in forecast.

name: Dabla
pitch: Dabla keeps you connected with your friends & family. Cross-device apps as easy to use as SMS and especially made for groups.

name: docTrackr
pitch: docTrackr helps businesses keep their documents safe and secure, wherever they're stored, whomever they're shared with. DocTrackr was acquired by Intralinks in 2014.

name: Itipic
pitch: Itipic offers a generic basket and private interface store and share product visuals with semantic information linked to their original websites.

name: Kawet
pitch: All-in-one solution to create & manage native apps for your enterprise. Acquired by Phenix Groupe in 2013.

name: Mesagraph
pitch: Mesagraph is a service that builds bundles of information from Social Media which are relevant and useful for its users. Mesagraph is now part of Twitter.

name: P1Security
pitch: Software editor and SaaS provider for security solutions to detect weaknesses in the telecom Core Network, monitor attacks and steer attackers

name: PrepMyFuture // Everlearn
pitch: Everlearn makes great adaptive e-learning products with your content.

name: Skerou
pitch: Skerou is a free mobile app that helps you prepare and benefit of exclusive promotions thanks to the analysis of your supermarket receipt

name: Studyka
pitch: Studyka organizes student challenges across the globe to connect student teams with companies and identify the leaders of tomorrow!

name: Zifiz
pitch: Zifiz provides a retail tool for consumers to purchase, or find nearby products in real-time.
